com.java.io

Class JavaIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.io.JavaIO

  • public class JavaIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for manipulating files in Java. - read/write/move/rename file - create/delete/move/rename folder - split path/get segments
    Author:
    Samuel T. C. Santos

        public static void copy(java.lang.String originPath,
                        java.lang.String destinyPath)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a file stating only the Paths of origin and destination. Use this method when you are sure that the destination exists!

        originPath - origin file path.
        destinyPath - destiny file path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
